# MessageBody indexer

索引器

```csharp
public SoraSegment this[int index] { get; set; }
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| index | 索引 |

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentOutOfRangeException | 索引超出范围 |
| NullReferenceException | 读取到了空消息段 |
